thread.title: 7-year-old MP boy loses 5 fingers in mobile blast
thread.title_full: 7-year-old MP boy loses 5 fingers in mobile blast - The Times of India

author: Amarjeet Singh
title: 7-year-old MP boy loses 5 fingers in mobile blast
text:
BHOPAL: A 7-year-old boy lost all the fingers of his right hand after a mobile phone exploded in his hands in Rajgarh district on Monday.
The incident took place at Bilapura village under Pachor police station of the district at 8 am.
Ajay, son of Hariprasad, was playing with his father's mobile phone while it was connected for charging, said police. The phone suddenly exploded injuring boy's hand, the police further added.
The kin rushed the boy to a nearby hospital from there he was referred to district hospital for treatment.
The police said that the matter is being investigated, however, a case is yet to be registered. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
